hanzi-su-wiki:
胴

Значения

Туловище, корпус

Мнемоника

Часть тела 月, размер которой примерно везде одинаков 同.
purpleculture_pinyin:
dòng
large intestine; torso
толстая кишка; торс
rtega_mnemonic:
胴胴RSlarge intestine, body, trunk
  • which is in the same 同 place as the flesh 月
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 同 indicates the sound; ⺼ (flesh) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 胴体 [ dòng tǐ ]: carcass; naked body
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • ⺼ meat, flesh; organic compound
    • 同 [ tóng ] same, similar; together with, alike
heisig_constituent: trunk, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, same, monks, hood, one, mouth
heisig_story: The word trunk refers to the part of the body that is left when you have "truncated" all the limbs. I can hardly think of any reason for doing so, unless one were lumberjacking corpses and needed to have them all properly pruned and made the same so they could be floated downstream without causing a body-jam.
myStory:
плоть монаха

у вас такое же прекрасное тело
Keyword_KANJIDIC: trunk, torso, hull (ship), hub of wheel
koohiiStory1: A trunk, a trunk // The body of a monk // The body of a monk in a trunk, a trunk.
koohiiStory2: Dead flesh all looks the same when you chop off everything but the trunk. Yes, I´m appalled at how gruesome this story is too.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The moon is the same as your torso. Because you’re so FAT! AHHAHAHAHAHA. I’m sorry, that was mean. But really, if your torso was as big as the moon, you’d have one large torso, y’know?
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine if your torso was as large as the moon. You’re a gigantic human. Imagine floating around in space like this. Wooooaaaahhh.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your torso got so big because of all the doughnuts (どう) you ate. You ate so many doughnuts that your torso got to be the size of the moon and then you floated away into space with your own gravitational pull and everything. Doughnuts are dangerous things.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine how many doughnuts you would have to eat to get your torso this size. Now imagine eating all of those doughnuts. I hope you like doughnuts, because you’re going to be eating a lot of them.
Ru_Meaning: trunk, torso, hull (ship), hub of wheel
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 口 (рот), 月 (месяц)
Ru_trainchinese: dòng: (графема) (о животном или человеке) тело, торс, туловище, туша; толстая кишка
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the body part (⺼) that's the same (同) for everybody is the torso

胴字的基本解释

胴
dòng
大肠。
躯干，整个身体除去头部、四肢和内脏余下的部分：胴体。

胴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dòng］
［《廣韻》徒弄切，去送，定。］
(1)大肠。
(2)躯干。参见“胴部”、“胴體”。

暂无。

Carcass
Basic explanation of words
Carcass
dòng
the large intestine.
Trunk, the whole body except the head, limbs, and the rest of the internal organs: the carcass.
Carcass
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dòng］
["Guangyun" just cut it, send it off, set it. ]
(1) Large intestine.
(2) Trunk. See "carcass", "carcass".

Carcass
Source glyph
Carcass
Name meaning
Nothing.
形声字。月(肉)表意,其形像一块肉,表示与肉体有关;同(1ong)表声,同是筒之省文,表示大肠比小肠粗,与筒颇相
似。本义是大肠。
①大肠:~肠。2躯干:~体。

Пиктофонетические символы.
Месяц (плоть) означает, что его изображение похоже на кусок мяса, что означает, что он связан с плотью; это то же самое, что и звук (1онг), и это провинциальный текст трубки, что означает, что толстая кишка толще тонкой кишки, которая очень похожа на трубку.
Первоначальное значение - толстый кишечник.

dòng
1) туловище, торс; туша
猪胴 свиная туша
2) корпус (особенно: цилиндром); фюзеляж
双胴飞机 двухфюзеляжный самолёт
Radicals: 月, 同  (moon, same)
Meaning Mnemonic
The moon is the same as your torso. Because you’re so FAT! AHHAHAHAHAHA. I’m sorry, that was mean. But really, if your torso was as big as the moon, you’d have one large torso, y’know?
Imagine if your torso was as large as the moon. You’re a gigantic human. Imagine floating around in space like this. Wooooaaaahhh.
Reading Mnemonic
Your torso got so big because of all the doughnuts (どう) you ate. You ate so many doughnuts that your torso got to be the size of the moon and then you floated away into space with your own gravitational pull and everything. Doughnuts are dangerous things.
Imagine how many doughnuts you would have to eat to get your torso this size. Now imagine eating all of those doughnuts. I hope you like doughnuts, because you’re going to be eating a lot of them.
